title: Release Notes
description: Experience this cutting-edge Nuxt.js boilerplate, crafted with the latest technologies and industry best practices. This template empowers developers to create modern, performant web applications with an exceptional development experience.

ui.title: Modern UI Framework
ui.tailwind: Tailwind CSS v4.0.0-beta.8 with dark mode
ui.icons: Comprehensive icon library with multiple sets

core.title: Core Features
core.vue: Vue 3 with Composition API for scalability
core.typescript: TypeScript v5.7.2 for enhanced type safety

seo.title: SEO & Performance
seo.sitemap: Nuxt sitemap v7.0.1 for better indexing
seo.schema: Nuxt Schema v4.0.4 for rich snippets
seo.robots: Nuxt Robots v5.1.0 for crawler control

dev.title: Developer Experience
dev.pnpm: PNPM v9.15.1 for efficient package management
